title: 이달의소녀탐구 #456 (LOONA TV #456)
songs: My Melody, 여우야 (Fox) - Togewori, DOLLS - 9MUSES, Let Me In, Pikachu Song
summary:
The episode shows the 'YeoJin+Secret' Performance.
0:01 -- The trio sings 'My Melody'.
0:07 -- YeoJin covers 'Fox - Togewori' that she choreographed herself and 'Dolls'.
0:22 -- HaSeul makes a surprise entrance. Everyone goes wild and asks her what's going on.
0:42 -- YeoJin looks confused when HaSeul announces that she is also a secret member. YeoJin: "I'm feeling betrayed!"
BBC can't show us more HaSeul footage because of time limitations (Sure.. ;) )
0:55 -- The original trio performs the 'Pikachu Song'
